text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki takes first in the Kikuka Sho.<n>The
audience is thrilled that she<n>managed to
overcome the limitations of<n>her distance aptitude
and conquer a<n>long-distance race. Their
expectations<n>rise ever higher.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
After the race, she asks to participate in<n>the
Takamatsunomiya Kinen, a<n>1,200-meter G1 turf
sprint.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
I'm puzzled by her sudden change of<n>heart, but
I'm sure she has a reason.
